knimeNode.name: Markup Tag Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filters all kind of Markup Language Tags such as HTML or XML tags.

fullDescription.intro: Removes all Markup Language Tags contained in the input columns. For string inputs the complete string will be filtered. For document inputs titles and all sections (abstract, body text) will be filtered.
fullDescription.option: The columns containing string or document values to filter for Markup Language Tags.

If checked the filtered values will be appended as additional columns. For each selected column one additional column containing the filtered values will be appended. If not checked, the input values will be replaced by the filtered values. The names of the new columns are those of the original columns with the specified suffix appended.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains strings and/or documents to preprocess.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains the preprocessed strings and/or documents.
